trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Whittier
There was one other sighting in Whittier on or around January 20th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailshovering kind of low with bright light [spectrum] spinning in a very fast circular motion then slowed down and the light dimmed. i was watching tv and my brother noticed it and called me outside and i saw this object spinning very fast in the sky and it was a very bright light and nothing that ive ever seen before. when i first noticed i could tell it was a UFO because it did not have characteristic and an airplane of helicopter. when i first saw it i was alarmed because i have never seen a UFO before so i was just amazed and astonished at what i was seeing. i lost sight of the object as it slow came to a stop of spinning and the light dimmed and then some trees blocked my view soi went back inside.
Summary: hovering kind of low with bright light [spectrum]
